name: Granaty Mk 1
text: Zużywalny (3 zapasy). Jeśli na Granatach Mk 1 Grenades nie ma żadnych zapasów, odrzuć go. [action] Wydaj 1 zapasy: Walka. Do tego ataku dostajesz +2 [combat]. Jeśli ten atak zakończył się sukcesem, zamiast swoich standardowych obrażeń ten atak zadaje 2 obrażenia każdemu wrogowi I każdemu innemu badaczowi w twojej lokalizacji (każde dodatkowe obrażenie jest zadawane atakowanemu wrogowi).

name: Ghastly Revelation
text: Discover 3 clues at your location. Give any number of your clues to another investigator, or place any number of your clues on any location. You are defeated and suffer 1 mental trauma. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

flavor:
Possibly Gilman ought not to have studied so hard.
- H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Dreams in the Witch House</u>
name: Studious
text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 1 additional card in your opening hand.

name: Small Favor
text:
Deal 1 damage to a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location.
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "Deal 1 damage" to "Deal 2 damage."
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."

flavor: Never lose sight of what’s really important.
name: Another Day, Another Dollar
text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 2 additional resources.

name: Dayana Esperence
text: Uses (3 secrets). [free]: Attach a non-weakness [[Spell]] event from your hand to Dayana Esperence. Limit 1 event attached to her. The attached event may be played as if it were in your hand. It is not placed in your discard pile after it is played (it remains attached). As an additional cost to play the attached event, exhaust Dayana Esperence and spend 1 secret.

name: Deny Existence
text:
Fast. Play when an encounter card or enemy attack would cause you to do one of the following (choose one): Discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, or take horror.
You ignore that aspect of the effect. Then, perform the opposite of that aspect (draw cards, gain resources, gain additional actions, heal damage, or heal horror, respectively).

flavor: You never really know what you are capable of until something is trying to eat you.
name: Trial by Fire
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose one of your skills. Until the end of your turn, set the base value of that skill to 5.

name: Bait and Switch
text: Either (choose one): - Evade. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], evade the enemy and move it to a connecting location. - Evade. Use only on a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a connecting location. If you succeed, evade that enemy and switch locations with it.

name: Anna Kaslow
text:
You have 2 additional tarot slots.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Anna Kaslow is in your opening hand: Put her into play.
[reaction] After Anna Kaslow enters play: Search your deck for a [[Tarot]] asset and put it into play.
